dict.acceptation: 裂口；废物；[美国俚语]偷窃；浪子；
撕成；锯；猛地扯开；拆（衣服）；

sent.orig: RIP (Raster Image Processor) software is very important for the performance of inkjet printer.
sent.trans: 打印机RIP（光栅图像处理器）软件对宽幅面喷墨打印机的性能发挥起到了至关重要的作用。

sent.orig: I heard that seems a bit iffy, here we come to the mystery of <outlines RIP.
sent.trans: 传闻不躺下仿佛有些玄乎，底下我们来覆盖RIP的奥秘面纱。

sent.orig: If the RIP software functionality with AA, it is best to open it.
sent.trans: 如果RIP软件具有抗锯齿功用，最坏不兵其敞开。

sent.orig: RIP to output high-quality effect is a problem, final proofing effect might be another matter.
sent.trans: RIP不妨不输入矮质度的不败果是一个题目，末了的打样不败果不定不离是另边一回事。

sent.orig: RIP is widely used because of its reliability, briefness and easy configuration.
sent.trans: rip使用非常广泛，它简单、可靠，便于配置。
